input.sentences: we saw a snow covered tree and headed toward it
we did n't realize how big it was until we got close .
next | we passed a small wood house in the middle of the woods .
as the sun came up | the snow melted off the tree .
it was almost unrecognizable as compared to before .
output.sentences: The trees were covered in a large amount of snow.
The closer I got, I realized how beautiful the sky is in the background.
Up close we could also see ice and spiders webs.
The sun hit the snow covered trees just right.
Soon, spring would be here and there would be no more snow around.
